WeightedAverageNumberOfShareOutstandingB.description: Average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per share (EPS).

GainLossOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpairmen.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Assets and Asset Impairment Charges
GainLossOnSalesOfAssetsAndAssetImpairmen.description: Amount of gain (loss) from the difference between the sale price or salvage price and the book value of an asset that was sold or retired, and gain (loss) from the write down of assets from their carrying value to fair value.

InterestExpenseDebt.label: Interest Expense, Debt
InterestExpenseDebt.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense for debt.

IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.label: Issuance of Stock and Warrants for Services or Claims
IssuanceOfStockAndWarrantsForServicesOrC.description: Fair value of share-based compensation granted to nonemployees as payment for services rendered or acknowledged claims.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.label: Proceeds from Warrant Exercises
ProceedsFromWarrantExercises.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from holders exercising their stock warrants.

SecuredLongTermDebt.label: Secured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
SecuredLongTermDebt.description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due to Related Parties, Current
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of such liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssets.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current assets classified as other.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, after Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease due after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.label: Class of Warrant or Right, Outstanding
ClassOfWarrantOrRightOutstanding.description: Number of warrants or rights outstanding.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleBeneficialConve.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Beneficial Conversion Feature
DebtInstrumentConvertibleBeneficialConve.description: Amount of a favorable spread to a debt holder between the amount of debt being converted and the value of the securities received upon conversion. This is an embedded conversion feature of convertible debt issued that is in-the-money at the commitment date.

DeferredIncome.label: Deferred Income
DeferredIncome.description: Amount of deferred income excluding obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

DeferredRevenue.label: Deferred Revenue
DeferredRevenue.description: Amount of deferred income and obligation to transfer product and service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

EarningsPerShareBasic.label: Earnings Per Share, Basic
EarningsPerShareBasic.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets (Excluding Goodwill)
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsExcludingGoo.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of an intangible asset (excluding goodwill) to fair value.

InventoryWriteDown.label: Inventory Write-down
InventoryWriteDown.description: Amount of loss from reductions in inventory due to subsequent measurement adjustments, including, but not limited to, physical deterioration, obsolescence, or changes in price levels.

LoansPayableCurrent.label: Loans Payable, Current
LoansPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of portion of long-term loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year One
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Five
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Four
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Three
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Year Two
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.label: Operating Lease, Impairment Loss
OperatingLeaseImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from impairment of right-of-use asset from operating lease.

OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
OtherNonoperatingIncomeExpense.description: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Intangible Assets
PaymentsToAcquireIntangibleAssets.description: The cash outflow to acquire asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Dividend Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated dividend rate (a percentage of the share price) to be paid (expected dividends) to holders of the underlying shares over the option's term.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Volatility Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The estimated measure of the percentage by which a share price is expected to fluctuate during a period. Volatility also may be defined as a probability-weighted measure of the dispersion of returns about the mean. The volatility of a share price is the standard deviation of the continuously compounded rates of return on the share over a specified period. That is the same as the standard deviation of the differences in the natural logarithms of the stock prices plus dividends, if any, over the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Risk Free Interest Rate
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The risk-free interest rate assumption that is used in valuing an option on its own shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Conversion of Units
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueConversionOf.description: Value of stock issued during the period upon the conversion of units. An example of a convertible unit is an umbrella partnership real estate investment trust unit (UPREIT unit).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Benefit Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeBene.description: Value of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DebtInstrumentPeriodicPayment.label: Debt Instrument, Periodic Payment
DebtInstrumentPeriodicPayment.description: Amount of the required periodic payments including both interest and principal payments.

DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.label: Disposal Group, Deferred Gain on Disposal
DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.description: "The excess amount received or due over net assets in a transaction accounted for as a divestiture where a subsidiary, business or operating assets are ""sold"" by the entity to a newly formed, thinly capitalized, highly leveraged buyer. This gain is not yet recognized and is disclosed on the balance sheet as an offset against the carrying amount of the securities received."

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts, Notes and Loans Receivable, Net
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Intangible Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as intangible assets, excluding goodwill, attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Assets, Current
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfAssets1.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of assets, including but not limited to property plant and equipment, intangible assets and equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.label: Impairment of Intangible Assets, Finite-lived
ImpairmentOfIntangibleAssetsFinitelived.description: The amount of impairment loss recognized in the period resulting from the write-down of the carrying amount of a finite-lived intangible asset to fair value.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAsse.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Fixed Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionFixedAsse.description: "The amount of fixed assets that an Entity acquires in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as information about all investing and financing activities of an enterprise during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFi.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Noncash Financial or Equity Instrument Consideration, Shares Issued
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionNoncashFi.description: "The number of shares issued as [noncash or part noncash] consideration for a business or asset acquired. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

OtherReceivables.label: Other Receivables
OtherReceivables.description: Amount due from parties in nontrade transactions, classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price, Decrease
DebtInstrumentConvertibleConversionPrice.description: Per share decrease in conversion price of debt instrument. Excludes change due to standard antidilution provision.

DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountCurrent.label: Debt Instrument, Unamortized Discount, Current
DebtInstrumentUnamortizedDiscountCurrent.description: Amount of debt discount to be amortized within one year or within the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DerivativeLiabilities.label: Derivative Liability
DerivativeLiabilities.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Derivative Liability, Current
DerivativeLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, expected to be settled within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

EarningsPerShareDiluted.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
EarningsPerShareDiluted.description: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Nonvested Award, Option, Cost Not yet Recognized, Amount
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationNon.description: Amount of cost to be recognized for option under share-based payment arrangement.

IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities.label: Increase (Decrease) in Derivative Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInDerivativeLiabilities.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying value of derivative instruments reported as liabilities that are due to be disposed of within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.label: Long-Term Debt, Maturity, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LongTermDebtMaturitiesRepaymentsOfPrinci.description: Amount of long-term debt payable, sinking fund requirement, and other securities issued that are redeemable by holder at fixed or determinable price and date, maturing in remainder of current fiscal year.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Distributions to Noncontrolling Interest Holders
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromDistribution.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest balance from payment of dividends or other distributions by the non-wholly owned subsidiary or partially owned entity, included in the consolidation of the parent entity, to the noncontrolling interest holders.

OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.label: Other Asset Impairment Charges
OtherAssetImpairmentCharges.description: The charge against earnings resulting from the write down of long lived assets other than goodwill due to the difference between the carrying value and lower fair value.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.
